vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Arabs living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.25.15;
son of: Ishmael (H3458);
brother of: Nebaioth (H5032), Kedar (H6938), Adbeel (H0110), Mibsam (H4017), Mishma (H4927), Dumah (H1746), Massa (H4854), Tema (H8485), Jetur (H3195), Naphish (H5305), Kedemah (H6929) and Mahalath (H4258)
Also named: cha.dad (חֲדַד "Hadad" H2301)
§ Hadar = "honour"
an Edomite king
(scribal error for חֲדַד)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈達 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "尊敬"
一位以東王 (創 36:39)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈达 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "尊敬"
一位以东王 (创 36:39)
